name: WorkItemUpdater
description: This task adds functionality to update WorkItems during a Build or Release.
author: Blue Basher

inputs.name: workitemsSource
inputs.label: WorkItem source
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source of the workitems to update.

inputs.name: workitemsSourceQuery
inputs.label: Query
inputs.helpMarkDown: The query to use as the workitem source.

inputs.name: workItemType
inputs.label: WorkItem Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of workitems to update, e.g. User Story, Task or Bug. You can use a comma-separated string to supply multiple values.

inputs.name: workitemLimit
inputs.label: WorkItem Limit
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of workitems to update.

inputs.name: allWorkItemsSinceLastRelease
inputs.label: Include workitems since previously completed deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown: While deploying a release to an environment, update all workitems since the previously completed deployment.

inputs.name: workItemState
inputs.label: WorkItem State
inputs.helpMarkDown: The state to update the workitems to

inputs.name: workItemCurrentState
inputs.label: Filter by WorkItem Current State
inputs.helpMarkDown: If defined, only update workitems that currently have this state. Leave empty to update from any state. Separate different valid states with ','

inputs.name: workItemKanbanLane
inputs.label: Board Swimlane
inputs.helpMarkDown: If defined, the board Swimlane to update the workitems to.

inputs.name: workItemKanbanState
inputs.label: Board column
inputs.helpMarkDown: If defined, the board column to update the workitems to.

inputs.name: workItemDone
inputs.label: Move to board column Done
inputs.helpMarkDown: Move the workitem to the board column 'Done' for split board columns.

inputs.name: linkBuild
inputs.label: Add Build as Development link
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add the build as a Development link to the WorkItem.

inputs.name: updateAssignedTo
inputs.label: Update 'Assigned To'
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the 'Assigned To' field of the workitem.

inputs.name: updateAssignedToWith
inputs.label: Update 'Assigned To' with
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the 'Assigned To' field of the workitem with a specific user.

inputs.name: assignedTo
inputs.label: Assign to
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user to assign the workitem to.

inputs.name: bypassRules
inputs.label: Bypass rules
inputs.helpMarkDown: Bypass the rules that have been configured for the workitem type.

inputs.name: failTaskIfNoWorkItemsAvailable
inputs.label: Fail the task when there are no workitems
inputs.helpMarkDown: If there are no workitems found to update, the task will fail.

inputs.name: comment
inputs.label: Comments to add
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comment to add to every work item that is updated

inputs.name: updateFields
inputs.label: Fields to update
inputs.helpMarkDown:
List of fields and values to update. Place each field on a new line and separate the fieldname and value with a comma.
Fieldnames can be found using: [Work Item Types Field - List](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/azure/devops/wit/work%20item%20types%20field/list?view=azure-devops-rest-5.0)
As an example:

System.Description,This is a test description
Custom.TestField,True

inputs.name: addTags
inputs.label: Tags to add
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tags to assign to the workitem. Enter a tag per line.

inputs.name: removeTags
inputs.label: Tags to remove
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tags to remove from the workitem. Enter a tag per line.
